state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to take a trip west. Okay, and then, go north. And then, make an effort to move east. Then, try to travel east. Then, move north. After that, make an attempt to go east. And then, venture east. And then, head south. Next, go south. And then, attempt to move south. With that over with, go to the west. Next, travel north. After that, try to go north. With that over with, recover the key from the floor of the kitchen. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Basement =- You arrive in a basement. An ordinary kind of place. You see a locker. What a letdown! The locker is empty! You see a counter. The counter is ordinary. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Basement =-0/1
next_state: -= Bathroom =- You have moved into a bathroom. Not the bathroom you'd expect. No, this is a bathroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Bathroom =-0/2
